BackstoryDef.title: Actor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled [PAWN_possessive] homeworld with a company of actors, playing to packed theatres and loving audiences everywhere. [PAWN_pronoun] was a perfectionist, and made [PAWN_possessive] own props and costumes rather than use the ones [PAWN_pronoun] was given.

BackstoryDef.title: Ascetic priest
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After taking a vow of silence, [PAWN_nameDef] joined a monastery on a peaceful backwater planet to spend [PAWN_possessive] days in quiet contemplation. [PAWN_pronoun] found happiness growing vegetables in the garden and making cheese in the monastery cellars.

BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] was cold, calculating, and made a good profit. In [PAWN_possessive] business, an utter lack of empathy was an asset.

BackstoryDef.title: Bartender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a bartender on a seedy space station. The job entailed one part drink mixing, one part diplomacy, and one part head-bashing.

BackstoryDef.title: Bodyguard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found work on a midworld, protecting whoever paid [PAWN_objective] from harm. [PAWN_pronoun] gained proficiency in many different combat forms, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] ruthlessness against those who crossed [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a nomadic trading caravan. It was [PAWN_possessive] duty to negotiate trade deals and ensure the safety of [PAWN_possessive] caravan from brigands and highwaymen. [PAWN_pronoun] became a master at managing wares, plotting routes, and striking good deals.

BackstoryDef.title: Castaway
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only survivor of a ship crash on an uninhabited animal world. For many years until [PAWN_possessive] rescue [PAWN_pronoun] scrounged an existence out of whatever [PAWN_pronoun] could find. [PAWN_possessive] survival skills became razor-sharp, but spending so long alone severely dampened [PAWN_possessive] conversational abilities.

BackstoryDef.title: Civil engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a civil engineer. [PAWN_possessive] job primarily involved designing and maintaining structures, but [PAWN_pronoun] did enough statistical analysis to keep [PAWN_possessive] mind sharp.

BackstoryDef.title: Civil servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a low-ranking administrator for a moribund government bureaucracy. [PAWN_pronoun] is most at home filling out complicated paperwork and playing office politics.

BackstoryDef.title: Colony settler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a settler on a new colony world. Such a life requires a jack-of-all trades at basic hands-on tasks.

BackstoryDef.title: Con artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never created anything in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give [PAWN_objective] what they had created.

BackstoryDef.title: Conceptual artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known in art circles on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld for [PAWN_possessive] unique and creative conceptual artworks. Nobody was sure exactly what [PAWN_pronoun] was trying to communicate, but [PAWN_possessive] pieces were highly valued by collectors.

BackstoryDef.title: Construction engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction worker on a midworld. [PAWN_pronoun] led a team which built everything from office blocks to cathedrals. [PAWN_possessive] busy job and numerous nearby fast-food outlets meant [PAWN_pronoun] never cooked for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: Counselor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A terrifying trauma when [PAWN_nameDef] was a young adult caused [PAWN_objective] to develop a serious eating disorder. With counseling [PAWN_pronoun] learned to have a healthier relationship with food, and decided to put [PAWN_possessive] new skills to use helping others overcome their emotional problems.

BackstoryDef.title: Courtesan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was used for [PAWN_possessive] body by hundreds of customers in brothels on several planets. [PAWN_pronoun] gained some mental marks and a special kind of street smarts.

BackstoryDef.title: Deep space miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did the sweaty, grimy work of pulling metal out of asteroids on a deep space rig. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] hands-on industrial skills daily, and wasn't bad in a bar fight, either.

BackstoryDef.title: Defector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] defection was not well-received, and agents were sent out after [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run, treating [PAWN_possessive] own wounds so no doctor could betray [PAWN_objective]. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

BackstoryDef.title: Drifter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never figured out what to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled often, taking up casual work wherever [PAWN_pronoun] found it. [PAWN_pronoun] also occasionally worked on a novel that [PAWN_pronoun] knew would be a bestseller, just as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] could find a publisher who was interested.

BackstoryDef.title: Escaped convict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] denies involvement in the crimes that brought about [PAWN_possessive] incarceration in a brutal penal colony. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by tunnelling beneath the perimeter using modified cutlery.

BackstoryDef.title: Evangelist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On [PAWN_possessive] 21st birthday, [PAWN_nameDef] experienced a religious awakening. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to spend the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life spreading the word of [PAWN_possessive] deity, the beauty of its culture, and its unusual medical tradition.

BackstoryDef.title: Explosives expert
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an explosive engineer employed in mines. [PAWN_pronoun] took [PAWN_possessive] job very seriously and was well-versed in the technicalities. But [PAWN_pronoun] refused to demean [PAWN_objective]self by helping with the clean-up once [PAWN_possessive] carefully-calculated explosion was complete.

BackstoryDef.title: Factory worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did menial, unskilled work in an industrial-era factory. [PAWN_possessive] job also included caring for the mules and horses which transported goods around the city.

BackstoryDef.title: Gardener
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On industrial worlds, wealth concentrates in the hands of those who own the factories and sell the goods. [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the mansion of one such rich family, tending the lavish gardens as part of a team of servants.

BackstoryDef.title: Geologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with miners and cave-diggers, identifying rock types and natural formations. During [PAWN_possessive] years underground [PAWN_pronoun] also gained experience repairing drilling machines and other technical equipment.

BackstoryDef.title: Hermit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Worn out by the pressures of social interaction, [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] crowded midworld city to live a simple life in the wilderness. There, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days alone, tending [PAWN_possessive] garden and crafting the simple tools [PAWN_pronoun] needed to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Hiveworld drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a mindless construction drone in a massive hiveworld civilization. Though [PAWN_pronoun] is now freed from the brutal social experiments to which [PAWN_pronoun] was subjected, [PAWN_pronoun] remains incapable of creative thought and leadership.

BackstoryDef.title: House servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped and sold to wealthy aristocrats as a domestic servant. [PAWN_pronoun] got to know the kitchens and basements of [PAWN_possessive] master's mansion well, but never did any work outside.

BackstoryDef.title: Housemate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As an adult, [PAWN_nameDef] kept house and cared for children while [PAWN_possessive] spouse worked.

BackstoryDef.title: Human computer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] turned out to have an excellent memory and a gift for performing complex calculations in [PAWN_possessive] head. A midworld dictator decided to employ [PAWN_nameDef] to keep track of [PAWN_possessive] state's finances and expenditure, since electrical computers were too susceptible to hacking.

BackstoryDef.title: Illegal shipwright
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: There are laws that say that you're not allowed to put terawatt-range grasers on a cargo scow, especially if you hide them under what looks like a communications dish for better ambush potential. [PAWN_nameDef] discovered that there is great profit to be made, however, by those who are willing to ignore such laws.

BackstoryDef.title: Inventor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a moderately successful inventor. [PAWN_pronoun] developed several minor technologies.

BackstoryDef.title: Jailbird
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] life in prisons, where [PAWN_pronoun] was put to work in the kitchens. [PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of getting into fights, and developed an aggressive way of speaking.

BackstoryDef.title: Joywire artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in an urbworld lab developing cutting-edge joywire software to maximize user pleasure. When the local government imposed harsh restrictions on joywire manufacturing, [PAWN_pronoun] began selling [PAWN_possessive] products on the black market.

BackstoryDef.title: Low-wage worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked a variety of casual jobs to support [PAWN_possessive] family, gaining a set of basic hands-on skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Luddite rebel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the majority of people on [PAWN_possessive] world chose to give up their individuality and biological humanity to join together in an online hivemind, [PAWN_nameDef] joined a rebel faction that chose to forsake most technology.

BackstoryDef.title: Machine collector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with old machines and arcane pieces of technology. [PAWN_pronoun] obtained them wherever [PAWN_pronoun] could, and loved taking them apart to see how they worked. [PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of talking about [PAWN_possessive] collection long after people around [PAWN_objective] had stopped listening.

BackstoryDef.title: Mafia boss
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high-ranking member of an urbworld crime syndicate. [PAWN_pronoun] bribed officials, maintained the loyalty of [PAWN_possessive] subordinates, and extracted overdue payments, by any means necessary.

BackstoryDef.title: Mathematician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did mathematical research at a university. [PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] spare time immersed in shooting simulations, though [PAWN_pronoun] was frequently ridiculed by other players for [PAWN_possessive] terrible aim.

BackstoryDef.title: Midworld chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a high-class midworld restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] was famous among patrons for [PAWN_possessive] creative culinary specialties, and infamous among kitchen workers for [PAWN_possessive] casual disdain for grunt work.

BackstoryDef.title: Military commissar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an internal spymaster in an Imperial army battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] made sure that the men were loyal, and did not fall back unless ordered. This made [PAWN_objective] unpopular, but [PAWN_pronoun] gained great skill at detecting the slightest dishonesty.

BackstoryDef.title: Mob enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for an urbworld crime lord as an enforcer. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

BackstoryDef.title: Model
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] modelled clothes and jewellery for advertisers, and was also used as a physical blueprint for characters in virtual reality simulations.

BackstoryDef.title: Navy scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Interstellar warfare is won by technology, so imperial navies are always on the peak of modern research. Even better, they have first access to Transcendent artifacts because they find them in space. [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a navy lab.

BackstoryDef.title: Nurse
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in an industrial-era hospital, doing routine work such as changing bandages and taking temperatures. It was a busy job, but [PAWN_pronoun] could always find time for a chat with a patient.

BackstoryDef.title: Paramedic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to respond rapidly to medical emergencies. [PAWN_pronoun] is used to dealing with severe injuries with only limited medical supplies. [PAWN_pronoun] treated so many gunshot wounds over the years that even seeing a gun made [PAWN_objective] uncomfortable.

BackstoryDef.title: Pit brawler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was nine years old when [PAWN_pronoun] got in [PAWN_possessive] first fight. [PAWN_pronoun] won, but more important was the enjoyment of [PAWN_possessive] audience. Pit fighting turned out to be a lucrative career for those who could survive it. And it was even mostly legal.

BackstoryDef.title: Psychiatric patient
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life in an insane asylum. [PAWN_possessive] industrial homeworld had a poor understanding of mental illness, and [PAWN_pronoun] was treated more like an animal than a person. Though [PAWN_pronoun] eventually recovered and was released, [PAWN_possessive] experience dampened many of [PAWN_possessive] basic life skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranch owner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a successful ranch where [PAWN_pronoun] raised animals for meat and wool. [PAWN_pronoun] refused to do any dumb labour [PAWN_pronoun] could pay someone else to do for [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Recruiter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a revered order of martial artists, infamous both for their skill in combat and for their practice of refusing to treat their wounded. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, judging the young people [PAWN_pronoun] met to determine if they might be suitable for training.

BackstoryDef.title: Reporter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years as an investigative reporter. [PAWN_pronoun] was notorious for making chaotic reports from exotic locations. Although seen as a lightweight by [PAWN_possessive] critics, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to break several high-profile stories after lengthy investigations.

BackstoryDef.title: Sailor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traversed the oceans on journeys of exploration, seeking out plant and animal specimens from exotic places, and occasionally fending off pirates. [PAWN_pronoun] loved the sea so much [PAWN_pronoun] refused to spend more than the barest minimum of [PAWN_possessive] time on land, except to sell the treasures [PAWN_pronoun] collected.

BackstoryDef.title: Sheriff
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the law enforcer in an isolated industrial town. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for having an arrogant attitude and a mean streak. [PAWN_pronoun] refused to lift so much as a finger unless it was for money, alcohol, or revenge.

BackstoryDef.title: Space marine
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior in an Imperial navy. [PAWN_possessive] job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And [PAWN_pronoun] was good at it.

BackstoryDef.title: Space pirate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Piracy appears everywhere that governments are weak and society spread thin. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of this age-old part of human existence, extorting and smashing peaceful trade ships for profit.

BackstoryDef.title: Starship cook
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cook on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] was very good, but spent far more time eating [PAWN_possessive] own creations than [PAWN_pronoun] should have.

BackstoryDef.title: Starship janitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While other passengers pass the years between star systems in cryptosleep sarcophagi, [PAWN_nameDef] had to wake up at periodic intervals to perform inspections, check the navigation systems, and to oil the mechanoids.

BackstoryDef.title: Starship nurse
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a nurse on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] was very charismatic, with a great bedside manner. But years of caring for battle wounds made [PAWN_objective] a pacifist.

BackstoryDef.title: Tactician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the space navy in an unstable system, fraught with large-scale interplanetary wars. [PAWN_pronoun] turned out to have a sharp mind for battle, and became adept at commanding large armies to great effect.

BackstoryDef.title: Taxonomist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled between star systems, studying and classifying the plant and animal life [PAWN_pronoun] found in the hopes of creating a complete catalogue.

BackstoryDef.title: Teacher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was educated in the liberal arts and taught at a public school. [PAWN_pronoun] was widely knowledgeable and well-liked by [PAWN_possessive] students.

BackstoryDef.title: Tunnelworld illuminator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Among tunnel-dwellers, those with vision as strong as [PAWN_nameDef]'s are revered as sages. [PAWN_pronoun] would lead the way, marking spots to dig with bioluminescent fungus and warning others of impending danger.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld entrepreneur
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the urbworlds, most suffer. But someone has to run the corporations. [PAWN_nameDef] learned the skills of the trade, becoming proficient at greasing palms and performing technical analyses. [PAWN_pronoun] is a sociointellectual machine.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld politician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: It's no secret that the Companies own much of the urbworlds, but someone has to take the bribes. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such figurehead. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to manipulate the hopes and dreams of the people while living comfortably in a penthouse.

BackstoryDef.title: Veterinarian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected [PAWN_possessive] stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a vegetarian, rejecting the meat-loving culinary tradition of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Aerospace engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an engineer responsible for the production of aircraft and spaceships. [PAWN_pronoun] focused on improving production lines, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] mastery of technical and research issues.

BackstoryDef.title: AI programmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a military robotics program, focused on developing smarter combat AIs. [PAWN_pronoun] was far more comfortable conversing with the AIs than [PAWN_pronoun] was communicating with other members of [PAWN_possessive] team.

BackstoryDef.title: AI researcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a researcher in artificial intelligence, robotics, and interactive holography. [PAWN_possessive] friendships with the artificial minds [PAWN_pronoun] created gave [PAWN_objective] the confidence and skill to interact effectively with real people.

BackstoryDef.title: Army cook
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the army as a volunteer, and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time cooking. Of course, of necessity, [PAWN_pronoun] also underwent basic shooting and survival training.

BackstoryDef.title: Army scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did scientific research for a planetary army. [PAWN_pronoun] studied war scenarios and designed weapon systems to help win battles with a minimum of fuss.

BackstoryDef.title: Art student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] graduated from an art university, after which [PAWN_pronoun] sought work in the art industry. Though [PAWN_pronoun] never found steady employment, [PAWN_pronoun] made some progress with private commissions, managing to make a decent living from [PAWN_possessive] work.

BackstoryDef.title: Botanist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a recognized expert in the field of botany, with numerous peer-reviewed publications to [PAWN_possessive] credit. A faculty member at a prestigious university, [PAWN_pronoun] always preferred research to teaching, and let [PAWN_possessive] graduate assistants take care of most of [PAWN_possessive] classroom duties.

BackstoryDef.title: Cargo pilot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot on a long-haul transport ship. [PAWN_pronoun] perfected [PAWN_possessive] skills at trading and at manipulating people while running cargo, weapons and contraband between systems.

BackstoryDef.title: Chemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a research chemist. [PAWN_pronoun] worked to develop new substances, from pharmaceuticals to explosives.

BackstoryDef.title: Chief engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial governor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a governor on a small colonial world, often fighting, but sometimes compromising, with the local gangs and their pet officials.

BackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a combat engineer, building bases, fixing guns and repairing vehicles for the army, whenever [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't shooting at people.

BackstoryDef.title: Combat medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted into the army as a combat medic. [PAWN_possessive] time in the trenches trying to keep [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers alive gave [PAWN_objective] a solid knowledge of first aid, but the loss of several friends made [PAWN_objective] stoic and reserved.

BackstoryDef.title: Corporate researcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leading researcher for a massive corporation. Though [PAWN_pronoun] found the social politics of [PAWN_possessive] workplace to be an annoying distraction from [PAWN_possessive] work, [PAWN_pronoun] still managed to progress up the corporate ladder.

BackstoryDef.title: Crime lord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With brutal and cruel efficiency, [PAWN_nameDef] rose through the ranks of the criminal underworld. [PAWN_pronoun] gained a widespread reputation for [PAWN_possessive] ruthless, cold-blooded methods.

BackstoryDef.title: Defense attorney
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Knowing that [PAWN_pronoun] could make more money with a quick word than with a blaster, and seeking a job where [PAWN_possessive] silver tongue could be useful, [PAWN_nameDef] turned to the law. [PAWN_pronoun] defended more than a few disreputable clients, but only if [PAWN_pronoun] was sure [PAWN_pronoun] could win their cases, and only if they could pay.

BackstoryDef.title: Drudge
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was never sure what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what [PAWN_possessive] future would be like. [PAWN_pronoun] entertained [PAWN_objective]self with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

BackstoryDef.title: Drug lieutenant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the drug trade under a local kingpin. [PAWN_pronoun] had [PAWN_possessive] men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around. [PAWN_possessive] social skills kept [PAWN_objective] on top of the political game.

BackstoryDef.title: Engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a tinkering engineer on a trading hub planet. Tough local traders forced [PAWN_objective] to learn negotiation skills, and [PAWN_pronoun] made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

BackstoryDef.title: Executive officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an executive officer for a large corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] never quite made it to the very top of the corporate ladder, but [PAWN_pronoun] still enjoyed the many perks of power.

BackstoryDef.title: Expert handyman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a traveling engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] fixed things ranging from simple communications arrays to the intricate software harnesses in AI meta-cores. [PAWN_pronoun] firmly believes that nothing is beyond repair.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier marshal
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the marshal of a prosperous town on [PAWN_possessive] frontier colony world. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to honorably uphold the law, but corrupt local politicians often made things difficult for [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Galactic sightseer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the stars. After reaching one destination, [PAWN_pronoun]'d scrape together the cost of [PAWN_possessive] next voyage by doing odd jobs on stations. It wasn't an easy life, but it was all worth it, as seeing the wonders of the universe was where [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] calling.

BackstoryDef.title: Game developer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an independent game developer. After an early success, [PAWN_possessive] career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.

BackstoryDef.title: Genetic scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Employed by a genetic engineering firm, [PAWN_nameDef] worked on enhancements for humans and livestock. The nature of [PAWN_possessive] experiments led [PAWN_objective] to develop a black sense of humor, which often made social gatherings awkward.

BackstoryDef.title: Graphic designer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed [PAWN_possessive] interest in artistic expression as a designer. [PAWN_possessive] eye for detail made [PAWN_objective] reasonably well-known as an artist, but [PAWN_possessive] meticulousness often led [PAWN_objective] to spend too much time perfecting a single project.

BackstoryDef.title: Hedge fund manager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed a life of luxury. [PAWN_possessive] portfolio grew as [PAWN_pronoun] charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. But that life came to an end with a financial collapse and the legal inquiries that followed. [PAWN_pronoun] was never convicted of any wrongdoing, but [PAWN_possessive] fortune never recovered.

BackstoryDef.title: Hired gun
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people. But so long as the pay was good, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't much care.

BackstoryDef.title: Human trafficker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] lost what little moral sense [PAWN_pronoun] might once have had.

BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] could track and trap animals in the most dangerous of places, and had a deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down large prey.

BackstoryDef.title: Information broker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his life traveling and observing, developing a large network of contacts and quietly collecting a massive bank of knowledge of people from all walks of life. [PAWN_pronoun] then learned where and how to best sell that knowledge for great profit, and became a powerful broker of information.

BackstoryDef.title: Intelligence agent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited by [PAWN_possessive] homeworld's governing body to serve as an intelligence agent. The government trained [PAWN_objective] in combat, but [PAWN_pronoun] prefers psychological warfare.

BackstoryDef.title: Jeweler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: To others, it might have seemed a trivial pursuit, but for [PAWN_nameDef], the crafting of trinkets was a passion. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years perfecting [PAWN_possessive] skills as a jeweler. Eventually, [PAWN_possessive] creations could be found in shops throughout [PAWN_possessive] home system.

BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved solving problems, and with [PAWN_possessive] steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes.

BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary pilot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to fight for causes [PAWN_pronoun] believed in. But over time, [PAWN_possessive] ideals faded and [PAWN_possessive] causes became those of the highest bidder.

BackstoryDef.title: Military engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an engineer for a colonial military. [PAWN_pronoun] got to play with weapons, murder drones, and other "fun" stuff. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in repairing and modifying mechanoids' tools. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] tested them [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: Military gunsmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the military with dreams of glory, but found [PAWN_objective]self stuck in a machine shop instead of on the front lines. Later, when [PAWN_pronoun] saw the rows of body bags returning home, [PAWN_pronoun] realized how lucky [PAWN_pronoun] was.

BackstoryDef.title: Miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made [PAWN_possessive] living locating and extracting rocks and minerals for industrial applications. [PAWN_pronoun] often had to repair [PAWN_possessive] own tools while deep in the mines, and frequently had to build supports for the mines, and so acquired some construction and crafting expertise, as well.

BackstoryDef.title: Musician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a talented musician, well known for [PAWN_possessive] compositions as well as for the quality of [PAWN_possessive] live performances.

BackstoryDef.title: Particle physicist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed cutting-edge physics research. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to help build a better, more prosperous and more peaceful future.

BackstoryDef.title: Pirate trooper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an interstellar criminal organization, and was often part of shock-assault boarding parties during starship raids. Though [PAWN_possessive] combat experience made [PAWN_objective] a good fighter, the ruthlessness of the job left [PAWN_objective] cold-hearted and unenthusiastic about social interaction.

BackstoryDef.title: Planetary diplomat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion and profession was interplanetary politics. [PAWN_pronoun] was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted [PAWN_objective]self to working toward peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

BackstoryDef.title: Political activist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was involved with a radical political faction which worked against [PAWN_possessive] homeworld's government. The guerilla tactics training that [PAWN_pronoun] received from [PAWN_possessive] associates gave [PAWN_objective] the skills to fight, but also drove [PAWN_objective] at times to compromise [PAWN_possessive] own beliefs.

BackstoryDef.title: Politician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in his homeworld's government. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to talk, and can inspire people to see things [PAWN_possessive] way.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone, deep in a forest. [PAWN_pronoun] protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] own material needs without outside help.

BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A contract pilot, [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for trafficking contraband without getting caught.

BackstoryDef.title: Spy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by [PAWN_possessive] government in infiltration and espionage. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to keep a cool head and to talk [PAWN_possessive] way out of tight situations, but when talking didn't work, [PAWN_pronoun] was capable of more direct action.

BackstoryDef.title: Station security
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was commissioned as a special constable on a space station.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld pimp
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] profited off of those engaged in the universe's oldest profession on a crowded urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled with [PAWN_possessive] fists, but also able to repair any injuries [PAWN_pronoun] inflicted.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld sergeant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a local police force on a crowded urbworld. Maintaining law and order in an environment where bribes and corruption were daily business practice wasn't easy, but [PAWN_nameDef] believed the effort was worthwhile.

BackstoryDef.title: Wandering healer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with [PAWN_possessive] practice on a peaceful midworld. [PAWN_pronoun] chose to pull up roots and travel to the rim in order to care for the people who needed [PAWN_objective] most.

BackstoryDef.title: Battle mechanic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with a group of mercenaries in an early fusion-era system. [PAWN_pronoun] was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized [PAWN_possessive] equipment with original modifications.

BackstoryDef.title: Plague doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provided medical care on multiple plague-wracked worlds. [PAWN_pronoun] improved conditions for those under quarantine, while administering complex medical treatments and developing medications. [PAWN_possessive] obsession with helping the sick left precious little time, though, for a life outside of [PAWN_possessive] work.

BackstoryDef.title: Private detective
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a private eye, sharp wits and a silver tongue were [PAWN_nameDef]'s greatest tools. [PAWN_pronoun] often spent [PAWN_possessive] nights working cases that ranged from uncovering affairs and learning trade secrets to solving murders and infiltrating criminal organizations. There wasn't a case [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't accept for the right price.

BackstoryDef.title: Shock trooper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was in a deep space shock troop unit deployed on multiple planets in various wars. During a risky assault, [PAWN_possessive] whole unit was wiped out. Nobody else knew what happened on the field that day, but [PAWN_nameDef] will carry the burden forever.

BackstoryDef.title: Adventurer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s thirst for adventure took [PAWN_objective] to many planets. [PAWN_pronoun] visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in [PAWN_possessive] quest to find novelty and excitement. [PAWN_pronoun] worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck.

BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: "How does this work? Why does this move? Maybe if I change this.... Oops.... I hope this works better.... Um, maybe I broke it? Oh, wait, no, it seems good now...."

BackstoryDef.title: Techno-philosopher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years surveying abandoned data centers, studying ancient artifacts and decrypting archaic coding languages. [PAWN_pronoun] claimed to be one of the few who could piece together the tragedies of the past, and offer a path to the future.
